first_release_search_depth.description: Configures commit search depth for first release. After the first release releasaurus will always parse all the commits since the last release

separate_pull_requests.description: Generates different release PRs for each package defined in config

prerelease.description: Global prerelease identifier (e.g., "alpha", "beta", "rc"). Can be overridden per package or via CLI flag

body.description: Tera template for generating changelog body

skip_miscellaneous.description: Skips including miscellaneous commits in changelog. Miscellaneous commits are commits that do not conform to conventional commits standard

skip_merge_commits.description: Skips including merge commits in changelog

skip_release_commits.description: Skips including release commits in changelog

include_author.description: Includes the author name for each commit in the generated changelog

release_start_regex.description: A regex pattern used to identify the beginning of each release section in the generated changelog. This is used during the `release` command to parse the changelog and extract release notes

packages.description: A list of packages to generate releases for in this repository

workspace_root.description: The the root directory to use for this package. e.g. "./packages"

path.description: Path to the package directory relative to the workspace_root

release_type.description: The release type to use when updating package version files

tag_prefix.description: The tag prefix to use for this package: default ("v")

prerelease.description: Prerelease identifier for this package (e.g., "alpha", "beta", "rc"). Overrides global prerelease setting

additional_paths.description: Additional directory paths in repo to include commits from when calculating next release version and changelog updates

items.description: A directory path to include commits from when calculating release version and changelog updates for this package
